query.commandtext: SELECT * FROM RWIPLOTSTS ??
SELECT * FROM RWIPLOTHIS WHERE LOT_ID = :LOT_ID ORDER BY HIST_SEQ
SELECT * FROM RWIPLOTSTS ??
SELECT * FROM RWIPLOTSTS ??
SELECT * FROM RWIPLOTHIS WHERE LOT_ID = :LOT_ID ORDER BY HIST_SEQ
SELECT * FROM RWIPLOTLOS ??
SELECT * FROM RSUMWIPSTS ??
SELECT * FROM RSUMWIPMOV ??
SELECT * FROM RSUMFACMOV ??

SELECT RS.OPER AS OPERATION, MO.OPER_DESC AS OPER_DESC, SUM(RS.TOT_LOT) AS TOT_LOT, SUM(RS.TOT_QTY_1) AS TOT_QTY_1, SUM(RS.TOT_QTY_2) AS TOT_QTY_2, SUM(RS.START_LOT + RS.END_LOT) AS PROCESS_LOT, SUM(RS.START_QTY_1 + RS.END_QTY_1) AS PROCESS_QTY_1, SUM(RS.START_QTY_2 + RS.END_QTY_2) AS PROCESS_QTY_2, SUM(RS.HOLD_LOT) AS HOLD_LOT, SUM(RS.HOLD_QTY_1) AS HOLD_QTY_1, SUM(RS.HOLD_QTY_2) AS HOLD_QTY_2, SUM(RS.RWK_LOT) AS RWK_LOT, SUM(RS.RWK_QTY_1) AS RWK_QTY_1, SUM(RS.RWK_QTY_2) AS RWK_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPSTS RS, MWIPOPRDEF MO ??

SELECT RS.MAT_ID AS MATERIAL, RS.MAT_VER AS MATERIAL_VER, MM.MAT_DESC AS MAT_DESC, SUM(RS.TOT_LOT) AS TOT_LOT, SUM(RS.TOT_QTY_1) AS TOT_QTY_1, SUM(RS.TOT_QTY_2) AS TOT_QTY_2, SUM(RS.START_LOT + RS.END_LOT) AS PROCESS_LOT, SUM(RS.START_QTY_1 + RS.END_QTY_1) AS PROCESS_QTY_1, SUM(RS.START_QTY_2 + RS.END_QTY_2) AS PROCESS_QTY_2, SUM(RS.HOLD_LOT) AS HOLD_LOT, SUM(RS.HOLD_QTY_1) AS HOLD_QTY_1, SUM(RS.HOLD_QTY_2) AS HOLD_QTY_2, SUM(RS.RWK_LOT) AS RWK_LOT, SUM(RS.RWK_QTY_1) AS RWK_QTY_1, SUM(RS.RWK_QTY_2) AS RWK_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPSTS RS, MWIPMATDEF MM ??
SELECT MAT_ID || ' / ' || MAT_VER FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT WS.MAT_ID, WS.MAT_VER FROM RSUMWIPSTS WS, MWIPMATDEF MD ??

SELECT OPER, MAT_ID||' / '||MAT_VER, TOT_LOT, TOT_QTY_1, TOT_QTY_2 FROM ( SELECT OPER, MAT_ID, MAT_VER, SUM(TOT_LOT) AS TOT_LOT, SUM(TOT_QTY_1) AS TOT_QTY_1, SUM(TOT_QTY_2) AS TOT_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPSTS ??
SELECT DISTINCT WS.OPER FROM RSUMWIPSTS WS, MWIPMATDEF MD ??
SELECT RS.OPER, RS.MAT_ID, RS.MAT_VER, NVL(SUM(RS.TOT_LOT),0) AS TOT_LOT, NVL(SUM(RS.TOT_QTY_1),0) AS TOT_QTY_1, NVL(SUM(RS.TOT_QTY_2),0) AS TOT_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPSTS RS, MWIPMATDEF MM ??

SELECT WORK_DATE, SUM(S1_BOH_LOT) AS S1_BOH_LOT, SUM(S1_BOH_QTY_1) AS S1_BOH_QTY_1, SUM(S1_BOH_QTY_2) AS S1_BOH_QTY_2,SUM(S1_EOH_LOT) AS S1_EOH_LOT, SUM(S1_EOH_QTY_1) AS S1_EOH_QTY_1, SUM(S1_EOH_QTY_2) AS S1_EOH_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPBOH ??

SELECT WORK_DATE, SUM(S1_BOH_HOLD_LOT) AS S1_BOH_HOLD_LOT, SUM(S1_BOH_HOLD_QTY_1) AS S1_BOH_HOLD_QTY_1, SUM(S1_BOH_HOLD_QTY_2) AS S1_BOH_HOLD_QTY_2,SUM(S1_EOH_HOLD_LOT) AS S1_EOH_HOLD_LOT, SUM(S1_EOH_HOLD_QTY_1) AS S1_EOH_HOLD_QTY_1, SUM(S1_EOH_HOLD_QTY_2) AS S1_EOH_HOLD_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPBOH ??

SELECT WORK_DATE, SUM(S1_BOH_RWK_LOT) AS S1_BOH_RWK_LOT, SUM(S1_BOH_RWK_QTY_1) AS S1_BOH_RWK_QTY_1, SUM(S1_BOH_RWK_QTY_2) AS S1_BOH_RWK_QTY_2,SUM(S1_EOH_RWK_LOT) AS S1_EOH_RWK_LOT, SUM(S1_EOH_RWK_QTY_1) AS S1_EOH_RWK_QTY_1, SUM(S1_EOH_RWK_QTY_2) AS S1_EOH_RWK_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPBOH ??

SELECT RS.OPER AS OPERATION, MO.OPER_DESC AS OPER_DESC, SUM(RS.TOT_LOT) AS TOT_LOT, SUM(RS.TOT_QTY_1) AS TOT_QTY_1, SUM(RS.TOT_QTY_2) AS TOT_QTY_2, SUM(RS.START_LOT + RS.END_LOT) AS PROCESS_LOT, SUM(RS.START_QTY_1 + RS.END_QTY_1) AS PROCESS_QTY_1, SUM(RS.START_QTY_2 + RS.END_QTY_2) AS PROCESS_QTY_2, SUM(RS.HOLD_LOT) AS HOLD_LOT, SUM(RS.HOLD_QTY_1) AS HOLD_QTY_1, SUM(RS.HOLD_QTY_2) AS HOLD_QTY_2, SUM(RS.RWK_LOT) AS RWK_LOT, SUM(RS.RWK_QTY_1) AS RWK_QTY_1, SUM(RS.RWK_QTY_2) AS RWK_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPSTS RS, MWIPOPRDEF MO ??
SELECT LOT_ID, LOT_DESC, FACTORY, MAT_ID, MAT_VER, FLOW, OPER, QTY_1, QTY_2, QTY_3, OPER_IN_TIME, LOT_TYPE, CREATE_CODE, OWNER_CODE FROM RWIPLOTSTS ??

SELECT RS.MAT_ID AS MATERIAL, RS.MAT_VER AS MAT_VER, MM.MAT_DESC AS MAT_DESC, SUM(RS.TOT_LOT) AS TOT_LOT, SUM(RS.TOT_QTY_1) AS TOT_QTY_1, SUM(RS.TOT_QTY_2) AS TOT_QTY_2, SUM(RS.START_LOT + RS.END_LOT) AS PROCESS_LOT, SUM(RS.START_QTY_1 + RS.END_QTY_1) AS PROCESS_QTY_1, SUM(RS.START_QTY_2 + RS.END_QTY_2) AS PROCESS_QTY_2, SUM(RS.HOLD_LOT) AS HOLD_LOT, SUM(RS.HOLD_QTY_1) AS HOLD_QTY_1, SUM(RS.HOLD_QTY_2) AS HOLD_QTY_2, SUM(RS.RWK_LOT) AS RWK_LOT, SUM(RS.RWK_QTY_1) AS RWK_QTY_1, SUM(RS.RWK_QTY_2) AS RWK_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPSTS RS, MWIPMATDEF MM ??
SELECT * FROM RWIPLOTSTS ??

SELECT RS.MAT_ID AS MATERIAL, RS.MAT_VER AS MAT_VER, MM.MAT_DESC AS MAT_DESC, SUM(RS.TOT_LOT) AS TOT_LOT, SUM(RS.TOT_QTY_1) AS TOT_QTY_1, SUM(RS.TOT_QTY_2) AS TOT_QTY_2, SUM(RS.START_LOT + RS.END_LOT) AS PROCESS_LOT, SUM(RS.START_QTY_1 + RS.END_QTY_1) AS PROCESS_QTY_1, SUM(RS.START_QTY_2 + RS.END_QTY_2) AS PROCESS_QTY_2, SUM(RS.HOLD_LOT) AS HOLD_LOT, SUM(RS.HOLD_QTY_1) AS HOLD_QTY_1, SUM(RS.HOLD_QTY_2) AS HOLD_QTY_2, SUM(RS.RWK_LOT) AS RWK_LOT, SUM(RS.RWK_QTY_1) AS RWK_QTY_1, SUM(RS.RWK_QTY_2) AS RWK_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPSTS RS, MWIPMATDEF MM WHERE RS.FACTORY = MM.FACTORY AND RS.MAT_ID = MM.MAT_ID AND RS.MAT_VER = MM.MAT_VER ??
SELECT FL.FLOW, FL.FLOW_DESC FROM MWIPFLWDEF FL,MWIPMATFLW MF WHERE MF.FLOW = FL.FLOW ??
SELECT OP.OPER, OP.OPER_DESC FROM MWIPOPRDEF OP ,MWIPFLWOPR FO WHERE FO.OPER = OP.OPER ??
